rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECB1101, ECF1100, ECP1100} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ECB2721, ECG2721, ECW2721}
Unit was previously coded {ECF2721%, ECW2721%, ECX2721, FIN2721}

description: This unit focuses on the topics of international finance and trade. This includes the importance of international finance, the determination of exchange rates, foreign investment, parity conditions, hedging and speculation in foreign exchange markets, foreign exchange markets-spot, forward, futures and options markets, the balance of payments accounts and the effect of macroeconomic policies on trade balance.
